channel.title: Xen missing chapters remake
channel.description: Hi everyone. I thought it may be a good idea to form a team and start amateur xen remake so we can play it before black mesa devs finish it. Hammer editor gives us all opportunity to create black mesa maps, so it would be cool to start fanmade project or edit existing xen maps from half life so they will be playable in black mesa after lambda core.

item.title: Xen missing chapters remake
item.dc:creator: HECU_MARINE
item.description:
Yeah I hoped for more positive feedback because I don’t think devs will release xen so soon I don’t know why most of you are so sure that it won’t take them more time then a year. And about this thread https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=14627
it’s really good idea there are already few maps for download I was working too but not much people are involved in. But if you want to join, go on.

Read full topic

item.title: Xen missing chapters remake
item.dc:creator: Conti
item.description:
I don’t understand the point of this thread if we already have this project and the future second release with the Xen levels.

Read full topic

item.title: Xen missing chapters remake
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
Gonna wait till the devs are finished with it!

But looking forward to Black Mesa: Blueshift!

Read full topic

item.title: Xen missing chapters remake
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Since Black Mesa’s out, everything HL must be remade using Black Mesa. C’mon, man, get with the times.

Read full topic

item.title: Xen missing chapters remake
item.dc:creator: Dr_Karamazov
item.description:
Let me get this straight…you want to make Xen before the devs do? Why?

Read full topic

item.title: Xen missing chapters remake
item.dc:creator: Suprememessage
item.description:
it’s been my personal long standing position that even if you can’t contribute, say the idea because it might just rot away in your head. However I think I’ll just wait for the devs to finish xen.

Read full topic

item.title: Xen missing chapters remake
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
If you want a group of people to do this then you should probably start something, get people interest in helping. I recall hearing a few times that no one likes the ‘ideas guy’ that can’t actually contribute work. Otherwise you’ll just have to wait a small amount of time for them to finish up Xen and ship.

Read full topic

item.title: Xen missing chapters remake
item.dc:creator: HECU_MARINE
item.description:
I came with idea and to work both. I can work on maps but not alone. I don’t want to wait for xen another eight years but I hope they will finish it sooner.

Read full topic

item.title: Xen missing chapters remake
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
If you think you can regroup a team and make those levels in less than a year, go ahead. But if you don’t intent to work on it and just throw the idea like that, I’d rather close this thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Xen missing chapters remake
item.dc:creator: amazingcomedy
item.description:
Kaweebo:

I’m sorry but that’s like forming another Half-Life remake in Source entirely while they’re still working on it. I think I’d rather just wait to see what they have in store.

I agree.

Read full topic
